rules_text:
Flying, Vigilance
When Honored Moramora leaves your graveyard create two 1/1 white Elemental creature tokens with flying.
{2}{W}, Discard Honored Moramora: Rejuvenate 2. [i](Exile two cards from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 2 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]
